location.text: Park City Club, 5956 Sherry Ln #1700, Dallas, TX 75225

paragraphs: Jacques deLisle is a veteran China-watcher, a scholar of contemporary Chinese law and politics. A professor at the University of Pennsylvania School of law, he has a special focus on the influence legal reforms have on economic reform and political change in China. Plus, he monitors the relationships China has with Taiwan and Hong Kong — topics that grab the current events headlines — as well as other international aspects of the giant nation.

speaker.name: Jacques deLisle
speaker.title: Stephen A. Cozen Professor of Law & Professor of Political Science; Director, Center for East Asian Studies, University of Pennsylvania Law School

title:
China's Traditional Inscrutability:
A Surprising Look Behind It
